title: 2025 Canadian Grand Prix start time: how to watch, live stream and F1 schedule
summary: Watch F1 via live stream or on TV: dates and start time for the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix, including all sessions

qa_pairs.question: What is the typical weekend schedule for a Formula 1 Grand Prix event?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Practice sessions on Friday, qualifying on Saturday, and the race on Sunday.
wrong_options: Race on Friday, qualifying on Saturday, practice on Sunday.
Practice sessions on Saturday, race on Sunday, no qualifying.
Only one practice session before the race on Sunday.

qa_pairs.question: Which Canadian city hosts the Formula 1 Canadian Grand Prix?
What is the common way to watch Formula 1 races live?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Through live streams or on dedicated sports television channels.
